titleStmt.title: A discourse of natural and moral impotency by Joseph Truman, B.D., late minister near Nottingham.
titleStmt.author: Truman, Joseph, 1631-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Clavel, and are to be sold at the sign of the Peacock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
